document_data.name: ''Luther's Protector''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Luther's Protector''''' was a [[staff]] [[Enchanted weapon|enchanted]] for the use of [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[monk]]s of [[Myth Drannor]], named after the decorated hero, Magister [[Luther]].
document_data.Description: ''Luther's Protector'' was a simple staff in its appearance carved out of [[beechwood]].
document_data.Powers: ''Luther's Protector'' possessed the ''+3'' enchantment and improved the wielding monk's initiative in battle.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Luther's Protector'' could bee found in the [[Deep Halls]] of Dwarven Dungeons in the scaly hands of one of the marauding [[lizardfolk]] led by a mysterious [[sorcerer]] [[Malgi Hi]], looted from one of the ancient tombs of the dungeon.
